inclusion.criterion: Post-bronchodilator FEV1 greater than 40% on the day of the bronchoscopy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of an exacerbation of asthma within the past 4 weeks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The bronchoscopist has determined the subject is clinically appropriate for bronchoscopy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: FEV1 is less than 35% predicted before or less than 40% predicted after bronchodilator administration
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of asthma and current symptoms are consistent with severe asthma. However, FEV1 is not provided in the patient's text.
